pages.text: $(thing)Bloodstones$() are dropped by $(l:aoa3:abyss_ores#bloodstone_ore)Bloodstone Ore$(/l). It can be used in various crafting and infusing recipes
This item can be obtained by using any Enchanted Book on an empowered $(l:aoa3:abyss_mobs#web_reaper)Web Reaper$(/l). Web Reapers can be empowered by using Nightmare Flakes on them
$(thing)Nightmare Flakes$() are dropped by all Abyss mobs. They are used for crafting and infusing, and can also summon $(l:aoa3:abyss_bosses#elusive)Elusive$(/l) at an Illusion Altar
